item.description: It's gut check time. Time to get serious. Time to up the miles. To redeem myself for last Saturday's exercise in humiliation (don't ask), I am running 10 miles along the Charles this Saturday starting at 9:00 AM at Panera Bread in Watertown. I may run in the direction of Watertown/Waltham on the path, or I may run toward the city on the path-- I haven't decided. That's just the fly-by-the-seat-of-my-pants kind of gal I am. Regardless of which way I run, I'd prefer not to run alone. (Whining is only truly satisfying when you have an audience.) I run 9.5 minute miles, so we're not going to be burning up the path. Speedy folks who passive-aggressively try to get the group to go faster are not welcome (Just kidding, anyone is welcome, but if you plan to run fast, bring a fast buddy with you, bc I certainly won't be able to keep up with you.) There are multiple turnaround points, so those folks who don't want to do 10 miles, don't have to. Please join me!
item.how_to_find_us: Panera Bread at Arsenal on the Charles in Watertown- 321 Arsenal Street

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Saturday Morning 10 Miler Along the Charles
